lines: 1. In skul marwamar SabatoIn ka maler chutho;Chunya korogombo ywayaMondo abi iri.
Ka maler (maler),Ka maber (maber),Ka maler (maler),Ka maler (maler)Chunya korogombo ywayaMondo abi iri.
2. Chunya oyudo mor chuthoE skul mar SabatoKasomo wachmar Ruoth YesuKaka nosethona.
3. Yesu Ruodhaman gi hera,Oluongoa mondoAdhi e skulmar SabatoMond` achiwne chunya.
